tasks.label: fvm clean & get
tasks.command: fvm flutter clean && fvm flutter pub get
tasks.detail: Runs fvm flutter clean followed by fvm flutter pub get

tasks.label: fvm build_runner build
tasks.command: fvm flutter pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs
tasks.detail: Runs fvm flutter pub run build_runner build

tasks.label: fvm build_runner watch
tasks.command: fvm flutter pub run build_runner watch --delete-conflicting-outputs
tasks.detail: Runs fvm flutter pub run build_runner watch
